channel.title: Цитата on Master
channel.description: Recent content in Цитата on Master

item.title: Liber Ecclesiastes 9:4
item.description: Qui enim sociatur omnibus viventibus, habet fiduciam: melior est canis vivus leone mortuo. — Ecclesiastes

item.title: A man's face is his autobiography
item.description: “A man’s face is his autobiography. A woman’s face is her work of fiction.” — Oscar Wilde

item.title: Чтобы стать оптимистом
item.description: „Чтобы стать оптимистом в настоя­щем значении этого слова, нужно ис­пытать отчаянье и победить его.“ — Александр Николаевич Скрябин

item.title: Music Is Enough for a Lifetime
item.description: “Music is enough for a lifetime, but a lifetime is not enough for music.” — Sergei Rachmaninov

item.title: Физик стремится сделать сложные вещи простыми
item.description: “Физик стремится сделать сложные вещи простыми, а поэт – простые вещи – сложными” — Лев Давидович Ландау

item.title: For Me the Intellect Is Always the Guide
item.description: “For me, the intellect is always the guide but not the goal of the performance. Three things have to be coordinated, and not one must stick out. Not too much intellect because it can become scholastic. Not too much heart because it can become schmaltz. Not too much technique because you become a mechanic.” — Vladimir Horowitz

item.title: There are worse crimes
item.description: “There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.” — Joseph Brodsky

item.title: Women Should Either Be Idolized
item.description: Women should either be idolized or left behind. Everything else is a lie. — Erich Maria Remarque
